emails.subject: Re: Kande Photo Booths rental follow up | Meeta Roy Birthday Party | 4/25/2026
emails.snippet: Asking about difference between Vogue Booth and Custom Video Booth
emails.draft:
Hey Meeta,

Great question!  Here's the difference:
• **Vogue Booth:** A larger, elevated platform booth with dramatic lighting that changes colors behind you. It's designed to capture runway-style video and photos with a high-fashion feel. The camera captures you from head to toe as you step into the spotlight.
• **Custom Video Booth:** A more traditional video recording setup where guests can record custom video messages or GIFs. It's great for capturing well-wishes, testimonials, or fun moments.

For a birthday party, the Vogue Booth would be more of a "wow" experience — very Instagrammable and gives everyone their red carpet moment.

Let me know if you have any other questions?

Thanks!
emails.notes: Birthday party - technical question about booth types

emails.subject: Re: Grace Barruga XS Nightclub - Conference Party
emails.snippet: Strategy World/Bitcoin conference party at XS Nightclub, 1000-3000 guests
emails.draft:
Hey Grace,

Thanks for reaching out about your upcoming event!  The Strategy World and Bitcoin for Corporations party at XS sounds amazing.

I've put together a quote for you here: KANDE QUOTE
It includes the AI Sketch Robot, AI Roaming Event Photographer, and Vogue Booth with half/full/extended day pricing.  The quote is dynamic and will adjust pricing based on the items you add to it.

With 1000-3000 guests, the AI Roaming Event Photographer is a great choice since it can move through the crowd and capture guests wherever they are.  The AI Sketch Robot is always a huge hit at conferences — guests love watching the robot draw their portrait live.

Let me know if you have any questions?

Thanks!
emails.notes: BIG corporate event - XS Nightclub, needs quote link

emails.subject: Re: Kailey Melichar Tech Client Photo Moment Activation
emails.snippet: INVNT - Tech client influencer awards dinner in SF on Feb 27
emails.draft:
Hey Kailey,

Thanks for reaching out about your upcoming event!

I'd love to see the inspiration images you mentioned, could you send those over when you get a chance?

In the meantime, I've put together a quote for you here: KANDE QUOTE
It includes our Vogue Booth with half day pricing.  The quote is dynamic and will adjust pricing based on the items you add to it.

For the influencer awards dinner, the Vogue Booth creates amazing shareable content with its dramatic lighting and runway-style setup.  We could also explore some custom options depending on the inspiration you have in mind.

As for timeline — we'd ideally need to confirm by **February 20th** to ensure everything is prepped for the 27th.

Let me know if you have any questions?

Thanks!
emails.notes: SF event Feb 27 - needs quote link, asked for inspiration images
